text:
A file called list.pl is not recognised as a cgi script, whilst renaming to listall.pl works fine.
Permissions and server config were not changed by the rename.
No messages go to the logs for the request even in debug mode.
creator: peter@glossop.org
slive@apache.org
text: This is almost certainly a configuration problem. (There is nothing inherent in the apache httpd code that could cause that specific filename to be treated differently.) Please ask your question on a users-support forum like the users@httpd.apache.org discussion list.
